example.eg: The announcement and the resulting protests have been all over the news today.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 随之发生的，作为结果的

example.eg: Do you know the result of the elections?
My customers usually see results in the first few weeks!
example.egtrans: 我的顾客们通常都能在头几周见到成效！

example.eg: Thousands of nervous students are awaiting their results.
example.egtrans: 成千上万焦灼的学生们都在等待自己的成绩。

example.eg: The doctor's office called to let me know they had my results.
example.egtrans: 医生办公室的人打电话说，我的测试已经出了结果。

example.eg: The annual results were not as good as the company had hoped.
example.egtrans: 年业绩不如公司预期的好。

example.eg: His lies were the cause of his dismissal from the company and, ultimately, of the entire situation that resulted.
example.egtrans: 他撒谎一事导致自己被公司开除并最终导致了整个结果。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 造成, 导致, 以…告终

example.eg: Our success results from our cooperation as a team.
example.egtrans: 我们的成功是团队协作的结果。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结果是, 归结为, 是…的结果

example.eg: He worked for 15 minutes before finding the result of the equation.
example.egtrans: 他花了15分钟才算出方程的结果。

example.eg: Doctors have noted an increase in skin cancer resulting from too much exposure to the sun.
The Incidence of home fires resulting in death and injury has risen sharply.
